about_the_game:
In addition to the local drives on your computer, do you have several external storage devices, such as HD and pen drives?

Every time you want to find a file or project do you have to connect each of these devices individually and suffer from slow Windows search?

Discover Neuria UltraIndex. It's easy to use and quick to search. It's the definitive solution you need.

  • Index as many drives as you want
  • Search your files even when your device is disconnected
  • Search only folders, only files or the full path
  • Use wildcards
  • Open the file, view in Windows Explorer or view properties
  • Instant Search
  • Your drives and files are unchanged
